publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3210 Lewis Macdonald: The Draft Mental Health (Cross-Border Transfer: Patients Subject to Detention Requirement or Otherwise in Hospital) (Scotland) Regulations 2005â€”That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Cross-border transfer: patients subject to detention requirement or otherwise in hospital) (Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved.Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*
